welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kastamonu, where history and natural beauty come together in a picturesque setting. Explore the city's charming Ottoman architecture, rich cultural heritage, and stunning landscapes, and immerse yourself in the unique atmosphere of this enchanting destination. Enjoy your stay!
